subject: JUnit-addons Runner and XML report
msgSnippet: I like the concept of marking long-time failing tests as to be ignored. So tools like Cruise-Control can report more often failure when new code is broken but
messageBody:
I like the concept of marking long-time failing tests as to be ignored.
So tools like Cruise-Control can report more often failure when new code
is broken but I will always be reminded that there are tests which are
ignored

Now I wonder what is to be done to incorporate the JUnit-addons-runner
into my cruisecontrol-setup. CC calls Ant which runs the normal
JUnit-task to test success and to write a report in XML. Is there a way
to run the tests by the junit-addons-runner and still getting an XML
report including the ignored-list?

Frank-Michael
